column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Hhesayo is seeking help with a fruitful endeavor.
Use the curious nopalitender powder at the designated location.
Slay the fruit-filled nopalitender that appears and obtain succulent-looking tuna.
Deliver the succulent-looking tuna to Hhesayo.
Excuse me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. I don't mean to be presumptuous, but you're one of those venturesome travelers I've heard so much about, aren't you?
I'm looking for help procuring tuna. It's well loved by connoisseurs of fruit, but what I require is no ordinary tuna.

No, the fruit I'm after comes from a particularly fruitful nopalitender. While I'd normally be happy to go out and hunt for it myself, they're as big as a house. I'd be stomped into the ground or impaled before I could even get close.
If you're willing, take this powder and sprinkle it about in the field to the north of town. One of the bastards is sure to show up before long.
I don't know why, but nopalitenders can't get enough of that powder. Sprinkle it about and they're sure to come running.
There you are! Any luck with the nopalitender?
You actually did it! I've never seen such a juicy tuna.
They're said to promote good health, you know. My parents would give them to me on special occasions when I was a kid, as it's believed they help fortify a child's constitution.
In fact, I've heard the Shetona crush up the stalks to use for weaning.
As for why I hoped to procure this rare treat, it's nearly my daughter's nameday, and I thought this might cheer her up considering all that's happened recently.
I don't have much, but please, take this. You've more than earned it.
